content.company: Venture Capital funded IoT thermostat & vent producer
content.role: I was a full-stack developer. I implemented front-end elements for a customer support dashboard.

content.company: Maker of the world's first $9 internet connected embedded computer

content.company: Modular computer input device maker for personalized control of any software.
